title: Companion Approval Guide
content: im. To Gandrel with Astarion, reveal Astarion The Pale Elf Requirement/s: Bring Astarion when you meet Gandrel Lae'zel + Astarion -Gale -Karlach - Gandrel Sunlit Wetlands - The Hill next to the Waypoint, just climb up the steps and find him. Drink from the well outside of Auntie Ethel's teahouse (well coords -35, 251) Gale + Lae'zel + Riverside Teahouse - Slightly southeast of frontdoor entrance to teahouse NOTE: Not tested for all companions. Party of Gale/Karlack/Shadowheart only gave approval
